TopicTitle: Lots of problems since last patch

Articles.Content:
When approaching Duna from the dark side it was blue (fog bug) 

dv calculation wrong : pushing prograde in orbit but orbital velocity increasing 10x slower than dv decreasing 

injustified spin on a perfectly symmetrical ship while in interplanetary transfer (stopped when entered a planet SOI) 

chutes randomly not deploying 

landing gear spring and rigidity tuning not doing anything 

simple nuclear engine is completely inefficient whereas quadruple is fine 

Electric charge not updating (always max with no generator no panel and motors off but spinning with réaction wheels) 

maneuver messy and unreliable 

Kraken (a lot of it) 

generally far less beautiful than before patch 2 (a lot of aliasing)
Since last patch, I have seen things no one should see, hoping for a new patch any soon

I saw the blue Duna bug, I think it happens when Duna is eclipsed by Ike. Reloading the game cured it for me, Duna now just goes fuzzy when eclipsed by Ike. Assuming the game bothers to render Ike that is. Also noticed a blocky pattern on Duna in high orbit.

Honestly, I think patch 2 broke more than it fixed.

1 hour ago, Turbo Ben said:

Honestly, I think patch 2 broke more than it fixed.

Yup
